org.nashua.tt151.libraries

Interface Controller.ButtonListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Controller

    public static interface Controller.ButtonListener
    This listener is one of the many options for dealing with button events

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPress(boolean opt)
      This listener method gets called when a button is pressed
      void onRelease(boolean opt)
      This listener method gets called when a button is released
